A second parallel together with a vvrit of error sued against the appealer. Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.
[16], 95, [1], 97, [1] p.
Printed [by J. Haviland] for Robert Milbourne, London : M.DC.XXVI. [1626]
By Daniel Featley. A reply to: Montagu, Richard. Appello Caesarem. A continuation of: Parallelismus nov-antiqui erroris Pelagiarminiani. Printer's name from STC. "A second tablet" begins new pagination and signature Aa.. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
